long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alva is an AI-powered research assistant built specifically for the crypto explorer. It's designed to cut through the noise and deliver real-time, comprehensive insights on projects and tokens. Think of it as your personal crypto analyst, available 24/7.

Here’s how Alva can help you navigate the maze of the digital assets universe:

🔍 Comprehensive Knowledge Base: Get a 360° view of both structured data (prices, TVL) and unstructured intel (whitepapers, blogs, news, and social media), all in one place.

⏰ Real-Time Updates: Stay ahead of the game with real-time market insights, because in the fast-moving world of crypto, every second counts.

📈 Social Sentiment Analysis: Decode the chatter. Alva turns social media noise into actionable insights, helping you gauge market sentiment like a pro.

💼 Trading Assistant: Alva’s got the tools to help you make your next move with confidence—proprietary indicators, on-chain signals, and more.

📊 Data Visualization: Visualize the details that matter, from token prices to onchain transactions. Alva crafts custom charts so you can see the bigger picture at a glance.

Start using Alva: 
🔸Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin the extension to the toolbar
🔸Sign in with your Metamask
🔸Start working with Alva
